answers.answer: I hope you got him to a doctor since your post here, but since he had open heart surgery a year ago, I can see he already had trouble with his heart and pain in the chest is enough to take him to the emergency room about!  How's he doing now?  With his head and eyes hurting, I hope they did a brain scan to make sure there is nothing there causing these symptoms.  He also should probably get checked for diabetes with his soda and constant eating.  There are many causes for diarrhea, and he is at risk for dehydration, particularly if he's drinking more soda than water.  Also, his electrolytes can be affected by diarrhea.

HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!There is a chance your husband has indigestion and acidity. But with a previous history of heart surgery, it would be a foolhardy not to take him to a doctor (cardiologist) ASAP. The possibility of a heart attack or angina needs to be ruled out.It is difficult to comment beyond this at this stage. Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!
